info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.
info.title: Twilio - Trusthub

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Customer-Profiles for an account.

parameters.description: The verification status of the Customer-Profile resource.
parameters.name: Status

parameters.description: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: The unique string of a policy that is associated to the Customer-Profile resource.
parameters.name: PolicySid

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.
parameters.name: Page

parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
parameters.name: PageToken

Email.description: The email address that will receive updates when the Customer-Profile resource changes status.

FriendlyName.description: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.

PolicySid.description: The unique string of a policy that is associated to the Customer-Profile resource.

StatusCallback.description: The URL we call to inform your application of status changes.

friendly_name.description: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.

sid.description: The unique string created by Twilio to identify the End User resource.

type.description: The type of end user of the Bundle resource - can be `individual` or `business`.

url.description: The absolute URL of the End User resource.

fields.description: The required information for creating an End-User. The required fields will change as regulatory needs change and will differ for businesses and individuals.

friendly_name.description: A human-readable description that is assigned to describe the End-User Type resource. Examples can include first name, last name, email, business name, etc

machine_name.description: A machine-readable description of the End-User Type resource. Examples can include first_name, last_name, email, business_name, etc.

sid.description: The unique string that identifies the End-User Type resource.

url.description: The absolute URL of the End-User Type resource.

requirements.description: The SID of an object that holds the policy information
